description: Try our easy to follow Pina Colada Ice-Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pina Colada Ice-Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Dip pan into warm water to loosen loaf. Lift out, invert ice-cream onto a board and cut into slices. Top with remaining pineapple and mint, to serve.
